Property.Name: CalculateWrenchQuality
Property.Description: Set true if the quality of the grasp should be calculated

Property.Name: DeviceName
Property.Description: Name of the hand used for grasping!

Property.Name: MaxObjectGripperDistance
Property.Description: The maximum allowed distance between gripper and object

Property.Name: MovableBase
Property.Description: Name of the body that the hand is attached to

Property.Name: ObjectName
Property.Description: Name of the object that is to be grasped

Property.Name: ShowDebug
Property.Description: If enabled, all contacts and simulation geometry is visualized

Property.Name: TCP
Property.Description: Name of the Tool Center Point of the hand
